website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for creating tinted, natural-looking brows quickly.
pros: Gel is available in a wide range of natural-looking shades
Tinted gel doesn't smudge easily and resits moisture
Gel is smooth, creamy consistency, and a little product goes a long way
Buildable color never looks thick or clumpy
cons: The brush is placed inside of the lid – you may find it awkward to hold

customer_reviews.title: I have brows finally!
customer_reviews.text: I could not live without this! goes on super smooth and helps set a nice definition for my brows. I chose the light blonde color and it is true to color. Matches to a dirty/medium blonde which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: the product was great but i expected the color to be more cool
customer_reviews.text: the product was great but i expected the color to be more cool. as an ash blonde, i need the cooler tones and this comes off a little more on the reddish/warm side of the spectrum. other than that, i really enjoy how the product applies and how the brush is stored in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: kelly adams

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff can be tricky. At least the light blonde one is. But if you take your time they come out really great. I for one have very thin eyebrows and this stuff looks natural. Way better than any pencil. It's also no joke water proof. Sometimes I can go a few days with just a touch up even after washing my face.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, Sleep proof, life proof.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil/cream. It goes on easy, allows for single strokes for a more natural look, and stays on a minimum of 24 hours. Waterproof, Sleep proof, life proof. Waterproof, sleep perfect, life proof. This will take you through it all with great looking brows.
customer_reviews.author: NWHypnogirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color!!! I’ve used ka brow for a few years now
customer_reviews.author: cheri wood

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural!
customer_reviews.text: I had this in a darker color that I think I liked better, but this is easy to apply and looks very natural!
customer_reviews.author: suezieqt

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! Just enough to give you shape/color but not over powering
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. It looks very natural and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McMillen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product but very disappointed in the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but very disappointed in the price , Amazon price was $11.00 more then in the stores in Myrtle Beach , S.C. so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hill

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Eyebrow Makeup
customer_reviews.text: My hair is black with gray throughout. When I went into Sephora to try this product, the rep used #3 which was way too dark. Foolishly, I bought it and wasn't satisfied with the color but I love the product. I ended up buying #2 at a later date and it's okay but still on the darker side. I found this #1 on Amazon for a lot less expensive so I decided to give it a try. What's funny is that this is meant for blondes but it works fine with my dark hair. I like a more natural look rather than bold, so this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It literally lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this stuff!! Never liked doing my eyebrows before but with this it literally makes it so easy and look perfect ever time it makes me want to do them! Highly recommend this product if ya struggle with doing them brows.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Gypsy Decor

customer_reviews.title: KaBrow is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on and is easy to use.. best I have ever had.. I am a blonde and don't like dark eyebrows. so I get the lightest one..
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne H. Crum

customer_reviews.title: It is the greatest eye brow pencil I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: It is the greatest eye brow pencil I’ve ever used. You can control the brush well. Natural looking and great color!!
customer_reviews.author: joan

product_meta.title: Benefit Ka Brow Cream Gel Brow Color With Brush - # 1 (Light) 3g/0.1oz
product_meta.description:
An all-in-one eyebrow cream-gel
Boasts a 24-hour
long-wearing & waterproof formula
Helps easily fill
sculpt & define brows
Provides rich
buildable color
Builds from natural-looking to dramatic
Creates bigger & bolder brows
Features a built-in hard-angled brush that magically converts to a full-size brush
Ensures precise control & effortless application
feature_bullets: Ka Brow Cream Gel Brow Color With Brush
